properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*)"COUNT" FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_TYPE, USERNAME , BOARD_TITLE, B.COUNT, B.CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN BMEMBER M USING(USERNO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON(CATEGORY_NO=BOARD_TYPE) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND USERNO = 1 ORDER BY REPORT DESC BAD DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
